text: Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma fhum Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma Aisaia suaŋgi bunira zɨn vugap, ana zav, gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen hɨgi. Ana hɨgap, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuaim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve wari ruar zav khavgiap Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma han zi. Mbe ana han zim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kurigi mbatɨgi fara muuŋgi gumgi, Fhe Bakɨme ndav shirɨ bakɨme, nden ki. The nde suaŋgim, nde ana ndav shirɨ ŋkɨɨa khɨngip regɨrie?
